name: cypress-desafio
description: Projeto de testes Cypress com Allure Report

scripts.allure:clear: if exist allure-results rmdir /s /q allure-results && if exist allure-report rmdir /s /q allure-report
scripts.allure:serve: npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:allure: npm run test && npm run allure:serve
